mapper.update:
update rc_recharge_record
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECHARGE_STATION_ID = #{rechargeStationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECHARGE_MEMBER_ID = #{rechargeMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where RECHARGE_RECORD_ID = #{rechargeRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select RECHARGE_RECORD_ID, CREATE_TIME, AMOUNT, MEMBER_ID, RECHARGE_STATION_ID, RECHARGE_MEMBER_ID from rc_recharge_record where RECHARGE_RECORD_ID = #{rechargeRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
